attributes.action: Forced to medicate in mental health hospital
attributes.additional_details: Formally i am now complaining of the force used in these apparent hospitals as a sort of help re-mould people in away into society this aint helpful im in here now this medication can cause instant death O RIGHT NOW THATS HELPFUL" nurses untrained into acknowledgement that not only is this un-nerving its not some damn flaky paranoia this is a genuine whoa obviously someone has died un-expetently on this medication so why are they forcing meds into us when all we want is to be peaceful especially eye from exodusrah@gmail.com let me know your thoughts lets understand each other not go soft a smile to someone could react and save someones lfe 3 days later as a link effect PEACE sign me im in
